534 (11:20 pm from Worcester)
537 (11:30 pm from South Station)
536 (12:20 am from Worcester)

Train 535 (10:30 from South Station) will be the last train to make all stops, including Yawkey Station (10:41 pm). After this time, passengers can take the Green Line from Kenmore to Copley Square for a bus shuttle departing Back Bay Station. 

Train 537 (11:30 pm outbound): Passengers will be bused from South and Back Bay Stations to Wellesley Farms then transfer to the train for continued outbound service. The train will originate at Wellesley Farms and will not service Boston Landing, Yawkey, Newtonville, West Newton or Auburndale stations. Passengers travelling from South Station/Back Bay to these stations may utilize local MBTA bus or subway service.
 
Trains 534 (11:20 pm inbound) and 536 (12:20 am inbound): Passengers traveling from points west to South Station or Back Bay will transfer to bus shuttles at Wellesley Farms.
